charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY CONDUCTED INQUIRIES REGARDING FOUR (4) DIFFERENT PEOPLE IN DEPARTMENT COMPUTER DATABASES FOR NON-DEPARTMENTAL BUSINESS.
